docs.snippet: The Latest developments in the presidential campaign (all times local):...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Latest developments in the presidential campaign (all times local):

headline.main: The Latest: Trump Vows to 'Make America Safe Again'
headline.print_headline: The Latest: Trump Vows to 'Make America Safe Again'

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton on Friday postponed her first campaign appearance with Vice President Joe Biden following the fatal shootings of police officers in Dallas. Republican rival Donald Trump also scrapped campaign events....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton on Friday postponed her first campaign appearance with Vice President Joe Biden following the fatal shootings of police officers in Dallas. Republican rival Donald Trump also scrapped campaign events.

headline.main: Clinton Postpones Event With Biden After Dallas Shooting
headline.print_headline: Clinton Postpones Event With Biden After Dallas Shooting

docs.snippet: After a grim employment report in May, the economy showed new life, tamping down some concerns about an economic slowdown....
docs.lead_paragraph: After a grim employment report in May, the economy showed new life, tamping down some concerns about an economic slowdown.
docs.abstract: Government reports American employers added 287,000 jobs in June, debunking claims that job growth is flagging; surge could reframe economic debate ahead of Republican and Democratic presidential conventions.

headline.main: Jobs Roar Back With Gain of 287,000 in June, Easing Worry
headline.print_headline: Jobs Surge, Easing Worries and Reframing the Political Debate

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton has found herself in the middle of a fight within the U.S. Democratic Party over the Pacific Rim trade pact, between President Barack Obama, who backs the deal, and opponents whose help is crucial to her White House bid....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton has found herself in the middle of a fight within the U.S. Democratic Party over the Pacific Rim trade pact, between President Barack Obama, who backs the deal, and opponents whose help is crucial to her White House bid.

headline.main: U.S. Democrats' Infighting Over Trade Pact Puts Clinton in Middle
headline.print_headline: U.S. Democrats' Infighting Over Trade Pact Puts Clinton in Middle

docs.snippet: In this heated and deeply divisive campaign year, America's presidential candidates responded Friday with striking reflection and restraint to the week's killings of five police officers and two black men....
docs.lead_paragraph: In this heated and deeply divisive campaign year, America's presidential candidates responded Friday with striking reflection and restraint to the week's killings of five police officers and two black men.

headline.main: Rare Restraint, Calls for Understanding From Candidates
headline.print_headline: Rare Restraint, Calls for Understanding From Candidates
